DOC.HEADLINE: NATION IN BRIEF ; FLORIDA ; TRIAL OPENS IN KILLING OF ABORTION DOCTOR
DOC.TEXT: The trial of an activist charged with murdering an abortion doctor opened in Pensacola , Fla. , with the prosecutor saying the man confessed , and the defense saying a government witness will be implicated . Defendant Michael F . Griffin ' s lawyers won a victory just before opening statements , as Circuit Judge John Parnham rejected a prosecution attempt to block introduction of graphic anti-abortion materials . Dr. David Gunn was shot three times in the back March 10 when he arrived for work_at the Pensacola Women ' s Medical Services clinic .
